MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY7 postcode area of Milton of Balgonie, affecting properties in Balfour Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.29am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault at Milton of Balgonie substation and our team will be  working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.34am on Tuesday 16th February 2021.
